name: The Ruins Beneath
description:
*pling*

You jump. You take a look at Ava, your partner, the one who followed you into this underground network of ruins and vast caves. She returns your glance, smiling:

"It is safer here than out there, you know that."

Slowly nodding. Overcoming fear. Going on.

Ava and Kai, two nomads who were dropped of in the middle of a ruined city, seek shelter in an underground space. Take on the role of Kai and navigate the secrets beneath the surface, riddled with woeful memories and sadness in this short interactive novel.

Press 'ENTER' to fast forward.

Developers

  • Katharina Broswik: Game Design, UI, Code, Art
  • Gregor Sönnichsen: Code, Writing
  • Ann-Katrin Keiler: Writing, Audio Director

Further Credits

  • Soundtrack: Awaken by Yevhen Onoychenko
  • Font: Finlandica by Helsinki Type Studio
